entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Deerwood
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
